name: Metal Wings: Elite Force
description:
Metal Wings: Elite Force is a 2d side-scroller shooter with classic features from the bests and new unique mechanics. Play as a soldier from the Elite Force Metal Wings of another world with advanced technology, uses the iconic weapons and shoot down anything that harming the peace, from bio-tech soldiers to huges mechanic weapons, plus unique bosses all waiting for you in the battle zone.

FEATURE
- Ultra beautiful HD graphic
- Auto target system
- Simple controller
- Unique Boss fights
- Well-designed characters
- Great balanced levels
